minesweeper

Class GameLogic

  • java.lang.Object
    • minesweeper.GameLogic

  • public class GameLogic
extends java.lang.Object
    Handles game logic all other classes uses board only through gameLogic gameLogic makes a new Board when the boards size is changed GameLogic is same through the whole gameSession

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      GameLogic(int size, double bombAmountPercent)
      Constructor used if width and height are the same
      GameLogic(int boardWidth, int boardHeight, double bombAmountPercent)
      Constructor used if width and height of the board are different

    • Constructor Detail

      • GameLogic

        public GameLogic(int size,
         double bombAmountPercent)
        Constructor used if width and height are the same
        Parameters:
        size - width and height (tiles vertically and horizontally) of the board
        bombAmountPercent - percent of tiles whit bombs at the board (board constructor maximum 33.33%)

      • GameLogic

        public GameLogic(int boardWidth,
         int boardHeight,
         double bombAmountPercent)
        Constructor used if width and height of the board are different
        Parameters:
        boardWidth - width (tiles vertically) of the board
        boardHeight - height (tiles horizontally) of the board
        bombAmountPercent - percent of tiles whit bombs at the board (board constructor maximum 33.33%)

    • Method Detail

      • getBombAmount

        public int getBombAmount()
        Returns:
        amount of the bombs at the board (derived from size and bombAmountPercent)

      • isPlaying

        public boolean isPlaying()
        Returns:
        true if one round of the game are running

      • hasWon

        public boolean hasWon()
        Returns:
        true if the game is won, game is lost if hasWon and isPlaying are both false

      • getBoard

        public Board getBoard()
        Returns:
        current used board in game

      • flagsLeft

        public int flagsLeft()
        Returns:
        flags left unused, the amount of flags in the beginning are the same as hidden bombs

      • newGame

        public void newGame()
        setup board for new game

      • setSize

        public void setSize(int boardWidth,
           int boardHeight)
        change size of board, takes different width than height
        Parameters:
        boardWidth - new width of the board
        boardHeight - new height of the board

      • setBombAmountPercent

        public void setBombAmountPercent(double bombAmountPercent)
        change the percentage of tiles whit bombs in the board
        Parameters:
        bombAmountPercent - new bombAmountPercent of the board

      • doMove

        public boolean doMove(int x,
             int y,
             BoardStatus status)
        do next move on board
        Parameters:
        x - x-coordinate of tile on board
        y - y-coordinate of tile on board
        status - new status to the given tile, changes if legal move
        Returns:
        returns false and does nothing if isPlaying are false (no game running) or if illegal move

      • checkTheBoard

        public void checkTheBoard()
        check if board are marked right (are game won or lost)

      • getTileAppearance

        public TileAppearance getTileAppearance(int x,
                               int y)
        returns the tiles on the tileAppearance of the board depending on the state of the game
        Parameters:
        x - x-coordinate (tileCoordinate) of the wanted tile
        y - y-coordinate (tileCoordinate) of the wanted tile
        Returns:
        enum painting tile in UI
